languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, прошу вас лично принять мой доклад — он касается преступного сговора среди высших офицеров. Они также будут присутствовать, чтобы иметь возможность ответить на обвинение".

traits.locale_text: "{name}, у меня срочный доклад. Я раскрыл раскрыл преступный сговор в личном составе высших офицеров".

languages.text: "Rogue Trader, please accept my report in person — it concerns criminal collusion among the senior officers. They will also be present to be able to answer the charges."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, прошу вас лично принять мой доклад — он касается преступного сговора среди высших офицеров. Они также будут присутствовать, чтобы иметь возможность ответить на обвинение".

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, please accept my report in person — it concerns criminal collusion among the senior officers. They will also be present to be able to answer the charges."
"Rogue Trader, please accept my report in person — it concerns criminal collusion among the senior officers. They will also be present to be able to answer the charges."
"Rogue Trader, please accept my report in person — it concerns criminal collusion among the senior officers. They will also be present to be able to answer the charges."
"Rogue Trader, please accept my report in person — it concerns criminal collusion among the senior officers. They will also be present to be able to answer the charges."
"Rogue Trader, please accept my report in person — it concerns criminal collusion among the senior officers. They will also be present to be able to answer the charges."

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、どうか私の報告を直接お受け取りください。内容は、上級士官たちの間での犯罪行為の共謀に関するものです。彼らも同席させて、告発に対して説明できるようにします」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, please accept my report in person — it concerns criminal collusion among the senior officers. They will also be present to be able to answer the charges."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、どうか私の報告を直接お受け取りください。内容は、上級士官たちの間での犯罪行為の共謀に関するものです。彼らも同席させて、告発に対して説明できるようにします」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, lütfen kıdemli subaylar arasındaki suç ortaklığına ilişkin bu raporumu şahsen değerlendirin. Kendileri de söz konusu suçlamalara karşılık verebilmek için hazır bulunacak."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, please accept my report in person — it concerns criminal collusion among the senior officers. They will also be present to be able to answer the charges."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, lütfen kıdemli subaylar arasındaki suç ortaklığına ilişkin bu raporumu şahsen değerlendirin. Kendileri de söz konusu suçlamalara karşılık verebilmek için hazır bulunacaktırlar."

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente, necesito informarle personalmente. Se trata de un caso de confabulación criminal entre oficiales de alto rango. También estarán presentes para responder a los cargos».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, please accept my report in person — it concerns criminal collusion among the senior officers. They will also be present to be able to answer the charges."

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente, necesito informarle personalmente. Se trata de un caso de confabulación criminal entre oficiales de alto rango. También estarán presentes para responder a los cargos».

languages.text: “行商浪人，请你亲自接受我的报告。这份报告涉及到高阶军官之间的犯罪勾结，那些军官也会出席这场会面，以便回答我的指控。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, please accept my report in person — it concerns criminal collusion among the senior officers. They will also be present to be able to answer the charges."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人，请你亲自接受我的报告。这份报告涉及到高阶军官之间的犯罪勾结，那些军官也会出席这场会面，以便回答我的指控。”

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, je vous prie de bien vouloir entendre mon rapport en personne. J'ai mis au jour une conspiration parmi les officiers supérieurs. Les suspects seront également présents de manière à pouvoir répondre des accusations qui pèsent contre eux. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, please accept my report in person — it concerns criminal collusion among the senior officers. They will also be present to be able to answer the charges."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, je vous prie de bien vouloir entendre mon rapport en personne. J'ai mis au jour une conspiration parmi les officiers supérieurs. Les suspects seront également présents de manière à pouvoir répondre des accusations qui pèsent contre eux. »

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, bitte nehmt meinen Bericht persönlich entgegen ... er betrifft kriminelle Absprachen der leitenden Offiziere. Letztere werden ebenfalls anwesend sein, um sich zu den Vorwürfen zu äußern."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, please accept my report in person — it concerns criminal collusion among the senior officers. They will also be present to be able to answer the charges."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, bitte nehmt meinen Bericht persönlich entgegen ... er betrifft kriminelle Absprachen der leitenden Offiziere. Letztere werden ebenfalls anwesend sein, um sich zu den Vorwürfen zu äußern."
